infos.value: Bravo! That is a legendary armament. I never imagined you'd have one in your hands so soon!
In other, faraway worlds, such armaments possess the utmost of power, and even in our own world they are said to possess qualities that we are yet to ascertain.
Even if you don't use them yourself, Lucio, you should make sure to have others equip them. After all, what good are the armaments unless we put them to good use?
Would you like to hear the explanation for Guidance?
